title: Do we really need Blue Essence to get mastery 6 & 7?
body:
I like the idea of champion mastery 6 and 7. You have to be good enough at your champion to get S grades, unlike Mastery 4 and 5 that you can get just by grinding out lots of games with a champion. It seems kind of weird, though, that you need blue essence to get it. I know that you can get blue essence with IP now through champion shards, but the whole thing seems kind of unnecessary.

-Blue essence has nothing to do with your skill on a champion, so why should you need it to get to level 7?  

-Riot probably makes barely any money off people buying hextech chests for blue essence, because they implemented the option to get blue essence for IP

-The complicated crafting system confuses newcomers

So why do we still have this in the game? We already worked hard for the Mastery tokens, don't make us pay extra.{{item:3070}}

You don't need IP or RP to get blue essence, just build {{item:3508}}
